# /ouroboros

> **Entry point for Ouroboros Master Orchestrator.**

This command activates the `ouroboros` agent. All instructions are defined in:
- **Agent**: `.github/agents/ouroboros.agent.md`
- **Rules**: `.github/rules/core-rules.md`

♾️ **The Serpent Awakens.** ♾️
